attributes.additional_details:
The U.K. police have shown how they deal with terror attacks especially the terrorist murder of Lee Rigby.
The 2 Islamic converts had approximately 20 mins to run amock and kill more people.
The brave police answer to the crisis ? Let's tape an area of until armed police officers arrive.
This is not good enough, if our police are not armed they cannot engage and save the public from these evil terrorists.
The police must be armed, brave and stop these terrorists.
